body_html: The first error you are getting is a tolerance issue. It's a flaky test, so changing the order of the tests leads to different initialization, and the test passes. We've also seen the second error you are getting, but in our case the error was much smaller, so we assumed it is also a tolerance issue. In your case error of 5 doesn't look like tolerance, we'll look into it.

body: The first error you are getting is a tolerance issue. It's a flaky test, so changing the order of the tests leads to different initialization, and the test passes. We've also seen the second error you are getting, but in our case the error was much smaller, so we assumed it is also a tolerance issue. In your case error of 5 doesn't look like tolerance, we'll look into it.
